tier.item: (128) Wo chi-le liang-wan fan, Zhangsan zhu-le san-wan tang, Lisi shi-ge shuijiao.
I ate two-Cl rice Zhangsan cooked three-Cl soup Lisi ten-Cl dumpling
(i) `I ate two bowls of rice, Zhangsan cooked three bowls of soup, and Lisi ate
ten dumplings.'
(ii) `I ate two bowls of rice, Zhangsan cooked three bowls of soup, and Lisi
cooked ten dumplings.'
